title: Adaptive Instructional Workshop for Personalized Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental language teaching methodologies and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: Practice-Centered Workshop for Current Elementary Teachers Aiming to Establish Personalized Language Learning Strategies

learning_goals: Design three assessment tools to diagnose learners' language proficiency levels (listening/speaking/reading/writing)
Develop two personalized language learning pathways reflecting learner characteristics (learning styles, interests, cultural backgrounds)
Create a lesson design plan applying adaptive learning principles (knowledge graph-based content linking, feedback loop structures)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
